quote: Scored free cheese curds at Johnie's Resort a short while later too. Thought they might serve food, I was wrong, and I was not looking to wait 20 minutes for a frozen pizza. Nice people there!
a burger and ice cream stand only open in the summer
has a great soup and salad bar with a big menu
an amazing craft beer selection on tap and homemade pizza
The wildlife was unforgettable too. Saw a coyote right off the bat. And then riding at night was magical with all of the fireflies.
